basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm David, a year 3 undergraduate student at the National University of Singapore. Welcome to my portfolio webpage where I share my experiences and projects. If you would like to contact me, you can reach me at my email

projects.title: Humble Trader
projects.description: Humble Trader was my attempt to do some simple signal generation on the Cryptocurrency Market. By utilizing the Binance JAVA API, I was able to generate some basic signals such as simple moving average and so on.

projects.title: Culture Finder
projects.description: Culture Finder was a project entry for NUS Hack&Roll 2021.A group of friends and myself created a telegram bot that performs searches for anime and also recommends titles based on genres user is interested in. Use http://t.me/Cu1tureBot to check it out on telegram!

projects.title: CAP 5.0 Buddy
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on during my university studies. Cap 5.0 Buddy is a productivity app that helps to consolidate university activities and academics. It has received good peer and course reviews.
